Articles.Content:
There has not been very many people that have seen these rare structures. This is a topic that will explain all about these \'Mun Arches\'. The first time I found one is when I landed on the Mun, I seen something shiny. I scrolled out to see what it was. It was a Arch.

Facts about these structures:

Height:

Length:

Width:

Color: A bluish-gray color.

Texture: Bumpy Texture.

Shape: An upside-down U.

Misc: Shiny from a distance.

Picture:

Thank you, this game is growing fast. =b
